name: 黃希敏
objective: 引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。
schedule:
1.	Intro. (Speech on “Lexical Pragmatics”)
2.	Definition and background
3.	Deixis and distance
4.	Reference and inference
5.	Presupposition and entailment
6.	Cooperation and implicature
7.	Speech acts and events
8.	Politeness and interaction
9.	Conversation and preference structure
10.	Discourse and culture
11.	MIDTERM
12.	Entailment // Presupposition’
13.	The co-operative principle and implicature // More on implicatures
14.	Speech acts // More on Speech acts 
15.	Politeness
16.	Making sense // Exploring pragmatics: projects
17.	Review
18.	FINAL
materials:
1. George Yule: Pragmatics (Oxford University Press)
2. Jean Stilwell Peccei: Pragmatics (Routledge Publishing Co.)
3. CNN關鍵用語─英語詞彙語用實例
